helpgrid.innerhtml: Select <IMG border="0" SRC="../webclient/images/node_collapsed.gif"/> to show children. Select <IMG border="0" SRC="../webclient/images/node_expanded.gif"/> to hide children. Select <IMG border="0" SRC="../webclient/images/drill_select.gif"/> to return location / asset.

checkbox.label: Show Job Plans for the Work Order's Asset and Location Only
Show Job Plans for the Work Order's Asset and Location Only

helpgrid.innerhtml: To create communication, select a template or directly enter the message and details.

table.description: Click one of the buttons below to add an Attachment to your communication.
table.label: Attachments

helpgrid.innerhtml: Build your GL Account by selecting values for each component from the table below. Click OK to return the GL Account.

The first table displays Labor and Cost information for the current Work Order and all of its tasks. The second table displays Labor and Cost information for the entire Work Order hierarchy starting from the current Work Order.

statictext.label: This problem code has already been reported on the following work orders for this location/asset.
If you would like to save your current work order, click Continue.
Click Cancel to return; your work order will not be saved.

helpgrid.innerhtml: To change the asset's current status from UP to DOWN or DOWN to UP, select Change Status. To record the start and end of the asset's downtime, which leaves the asset in its current status, select Report Downtime.
This table lists the follow-up work orders generated from the current work order.
The first table displays all of the items and services currently on Purchase Orders for the current Work Order. The second table displays the Purchase Requisitions for the current Work Order.
Move all Year to Date quantities back one year and change the current Year to Date Quantity to zero?
Select a different GL control account or GL shrinkage account if required. To reconcile the balance for the item in the displayed storeroom, click OK.
Please select one of the choices below. You may complete your active assignment or start another workflow process.
There is more than one workflow process available for this application. Please select the one you want from the Process drop-down and press OK.

When you are viewing an active assignment from your Workflow Inbox, you can choose from the following actions:
  • To carry out this assignment and route the record to the next assignment, click the button from the toolbar or select Route Workflow from the actions menu.

  • To view the workflow history of this record, select View Workflow History from the actions menu. From there you can link to a list of current assignees and to the map image that shows where the record is in its process flow.

  • To Print this record click Print with Attachments from the action Menu.

  • To return to the MAXIMO Start Center to view other records in your Workflow Inbox, click the Start Center link at the top of the screen.

checkbox.label: Show this help when launching records from the inbox

helpgrid.innerhtml: You have chosen to stop the active workflow process for this record. Choose one or both of the 'Send e-mail' options below to notify users that this workflow process has been stopped. Optionally enter an e-mail message and transaction memo below. Click OK to stop the workflow process for this record. Click Cancel to return to the record.
You have chosen to reassign this task to someone else. Please choose a person and optionally enter a memo. To send a notification that this assignment has been reassigned, enter notifications.
To create a KPI using your current query, fill out the form below. To run or edit the KPI, go to the KPI application or set up your personalized Start Center to display the corresponding KPI.

section.label: Links
section.description: To link this KPI to another or to a Report select the corresponding link(s) by using the lookups.

helpgrid.innerhtml: The first table displays Labor and Cost information for the current ticket and all of its activities. The second table displays Labor and Cost information for the entire activity hierarchy starting from the current ticket.

dialog.label: View Related Records for Service Group

radiobutton.label: View Related Records for the Service Group
View Related Records for the Service Group and Services

dialog.label: Create Job Plan from Work Plan

helpgrid.innerhtml: Enter a job plan number or generate one by clicking Autonumber. Click OK to create the Job Plan.
This will change the status of {_listcount} records.

statictext.label: The Timer is going to record the time you have spent managing your
Review the information below before submitting.
You may update the values and click 'OK' to submit.
Click 'Cancel' to return to the record; the Timer will continue to run.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Select a favorite item to add to your requisition by entering a quantity. To check the current price and availability of an item, click the button in the far right column.
To distribute the cost of the current requisition line to additional accounts, click New Row. When you are finished or if you don't want to make any changes, click OK.

This screen displays the items on requisitions you have created, including both templates and those you have submitted, but not drafts. Fill in one or more search fields and click Find to look for requisitions. To select an item to add to your requisition, enter a quantity and optionally a date needed. To check an item's current price and availability, click the button in the table row.

section.label: Return Order Requisition {0} has been submitted.
Draft Return Order Req. {0} has been submitted.

dialog.label: Associate Existing Document Folders with this Application

helpgrid.innerhtml: To associate additional document folders with the current application, click New Row.

pushbutton.label: Add a Document to the Library

checkbox.label: Copy document to the default location set by your administrator (recommended)
Add document to the document library for others to use

helpgrid.innerhtml: Only files with the following formats can be enabled for printing: .pdf, .xls, .csv, .txt, .doc, .gif, .jpg, .ppt. Clear the check box beside the Print Document with Work Pack option (Advanced Option) if the file being attached is not in one of these formats.

checkbox.label: Copy document to the default location set by your administrator (recommended)
Add document to the document library for others to use
Add document to the document library for others to use
Add document to the document library for others to use
Copy document to the default location set by your administrator (recommended)

dialog.label: Create Attachments from Documents in the Library

helpgrid.innerhtml: Choose documents to attach to the current record and then select the folder to which they will be assigned.

dialog.label: Create Attachments from Documents in the Library

helpgrid.innerhtml: Choose documents to attach to the current record and then select the folder to which they will be assigned.
Press to view or modify phone numbers or e-mail addresses if there are more than one.
To change your password, enter your current password and then enter your new password.

section.label: Select Schedule or Time Interval
section.description: Select a date interval and then Preview to see the dates.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Select a failure code by clicking anywhere in the row. Click Select to select the highlighted row and move down to the next level of the failure hierarchy. Click Select and Return to select the highlighted row and return without continuing down the hierarchy. Click Cancel to return to the original page with no selections.
To associate commodities with this contract use New Row and add an individual commodity or use Select Commodities to select multiple records simultaneously.
To make changes to an asset's location, parent/child relationship, users and custodians, and attributes, select the appropriate tab below.

section.label: Mass Move
section.description: Use the fields listed below to specify a new location, parent, or bin for all the assets listed above.
